benchmark_details.name: ArBanking77
benchmark_details.overview: ArBanking77 is a large Arabic dataset for intent detection in the banking domain, consisting of 31,404 queries in Modern Standard Arabic and Palestinian dialect, classified into 77 intents.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide an Arabic intent dataset to aid in the development and evaluation of intent detection models in the banking domain.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Our dataset is limited to MSA and Palestinian dialect and covers only 77 intents.

data.source: The dataset was arabized and localized from the original Banking77 dataset.
data.annotation: The data was annotated by 26 annotators through multiple phases and reviewed for quality.

methodology.calculation: The F1 Score was calculated based on precision and recall from the predictions made by the model.
methodology.interpretation: An F1 Score closer to 1 indicates better model performance in correctly identifying intents.
methodology.validation: The dataset was split into training (90%) and validation (10%) sets.
